work.summary: Building infrastruture for automated testing of Visual Studio IDE.
highlights: Delivering a service for creating and managing virtual machines on self-hosted hardware that enables existing CI/CD pipelines to test on ARM64 for the first time. The service leverages Parallels Virtualization, Python scripts, and Azure DevOps Pipelines for management of the VMs.
Built a server-less api using .NET and Azure Durable Functions for accessing the performance data of builds from an Azure DevOps plugin.
Designed a NoSQL database schema and built the ingestion code for performance data of 200+ builds per week.
Instrumented telemetry collection and visualization to ensure a smooth transition of our on-prem testing infrastructure to cloud infrastructure.

work.summary: Built a full stack website and mobile application for a Discord-like community management tool.
highlights: Built a NodeJS + MongoDB backend to manage users, posts, communities, and wiki documents.
Created a React SPA and React Native mobile application utilizing Redux for state management.
Built a notifications system using scheduled sever-less functions and integrated with Twilio api for communication.
Managed Azure cloud infrastructure and established continuous deployment through Azure DevOps Pipelines.
Onboarded 50+ users and monitored customer feedback/telemetry to improve the product.
